title: Databrowser
description: Customizable data visualization web-app. I coordinated a team and developed new features for an outdated application. We managed to recover most of the technical debt accumulated by adding both e2e and unit tests, updating existing dependencies, adding tools to improve the developer experience, and progressively refactoring the whole codebase to use Typescript and modern React paradigms.

title: Jarvis
description: Web application for parameter calculation of lenses and ISO certification printing made for a big lenses manifacturer. I was the lead front-end developer in an agile team, and I created the front-end application from scratch with a TDD approach.
